languages.text: "Свобода... менять судьбу?" {n}Проктор повторяет медленно, с интонацией полного неверия в происходящее.{/n} "Даже ты, вырожденец, должен знать — человек обязан служить Богу-Императору так, как указано по рождению, и любая попытка изменить это положение — нарушение законов Его!"

"Forge... a new destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that man is bound to serve the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"
languages.original_text: "Свобода... менять судьбу?" {n}Проктор повторяет медленно, с интонацией полного неверия в происходящее.{/n} "Даже ты, вырожденец, должен знать — человек обязан служить Богу-Императору так, как указано по рождению, и любая попытка изменить это положение — нарушение законов Его!"

traits.locale_text: "Freedom... to change destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that man is bound to serve the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

"Freedom... To change destiny?" {n}The Proctor repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that every man has his place in the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and an attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

"Forge... a new destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that man is bound to serve the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

"Forge... a new destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that man is bound to serve the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

"Freedom... to change destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that everyone has their place in the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

"Freedom... to change destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that everyone has their place in the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

"Freedom... to change destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that man is bound to serve the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

languages.text: “改变命运……的自由？”{n}索罗蒙以难以置信的语气，慢慢重复了一遍这句话，仿佛不敢相信自己听到的一切。{/n}“即便是你，这个堕落的恶棍，也应该知道，每个人自诞生之时起，就必须听从神皇的安排。若是有谁打算改变自己的命运，就是在忤逆祂的意志！”
languages.original_text: "Forge... a new destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that man is bound to serve the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

traits.locale_text: “改变命运……的自由？”{n}索罗蒙以难以置信的语气，慢慢重复了一遍这句话，仿佛不敢相信自己听到的一切。{/n}“即便是你，这个堕落的恶棍，也应该知道，每个人自诞生之时起，就必须听从神皇的安排。若是有谁打算改变自己的命运，就是在忤逆祂的意志！”

languages.text: «¿Labrado... un nuevo destino?», {n}repite Solomorne muy despacio, sin poder dar crédito a lo que está oyendo.{/n} «¡Incluso tú, un degenerado, deberías saber que todo humano tiene un papel que cumplir en el plan del Dios Emperador desde que nace, y que cualquier intento por cambiar ese destino supone una violación de Su ley!».
languages.original_text: "Forge... a new destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that man is bound to serve the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Labrado... un nuevo destino?», {n}repite Solomorne muy despacio, sin poder dar crédito a lo que está oyendo.{/n} «¡Incluso tú, un degenerado, deberías saber que todo humano tiene un papel que cumplir en el plan del Dios Emperador desde que nace, y que cualquier intento por cambiar ese destino supone una violación de Su ley!».

languages.text: "Kaderini yeniden şekillendirmek mi?" {n}Solomorne, bu duyduklarını pek de inanamadığını gösteren bir şekilde tekrarlıyor.{/n} "Senin gibi yozlaşmış biri bile herkesin doğuştan Tanrı İmparator'a hizmet etmekle yükümlü olduğunu ve bunu değiştirme girişiminin O'nun iradesinin ihlali olduğunu bilmeli!"
languages.original_text: "Forge... a new destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that man is bound to serve the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

traits.locale_text: "Kaderini yeniden şekillendirmek mi?" {n}Solomorne, bu duyduklarını pek de inanamadığını gösteren bir şekilde tekrarlıyor.{/n} "Senin gibi yozlaşmış biri bile herkesin doğuştan Tanrı İmparator'a hizmet etmekle yükümlü olduğunu ve bunu değiştirme girişiminin O'nun iradesinin ihlali olduğunu bilmeli!"

languages.text: 「運命を変える自由…？」{n}ソロモーンは、聞いていることをまったく信じないという様子の低い声でゆっくりと繰り返す。{/n}「たとえ、お前が堕落した人であっても、すべての者が生まれた時から神帝陛下の計画の中に居場所を持っているということを知るべきであり、それを変えようとするいかなる試みも陛下の意志に反する行為だ！」
languages.original_text: "Freedom... to change destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that everyone has their place in the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

traits.locale_text: 「運命を変える自由…？」{n}ソロモーンは、聞いていることをまったく信じないという様子の低い声でゆっくりと繰り返す。{/n}「たとえ、お前が堕落した人であっても、すべての者が生まれた時から神帝陛下の計画の中に居場所を持っているということを知るべきであり、それを変えようとするいかなる試みも陛下の意志に反する行為だ！」

languages.text: « La liberté... de changer son destin ? {n}Solomorne répète lentement les propos de votre vis-à-vis, sans cacher son incrédulité devant un tel discours.{/n} Même un dégénéré tel que vous devrait savoir que toute personne a dès la naissance le devoir de servir le grand dessein de l'Empereur-Dieu, et que toute tentative pour s'y soustraire est un outrage à Sa volonté ! »
languages.original_text: "Forge... a new destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that man is bound to serve the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

traits.locale_text: « La liberté... de changer son destin ? {n}Solomorne répète lentement les propos de votre vis-à-vis, sans cacher son incrédulité devant un tel discours.{/n} Même un dégénéré tel que vous devrait savoir que toute personne a dès la naissance le devoir de servir le grand dessein de l'Empereur-Dieu, et que toute tentative pour s'y soustraire est un outrage à Sa volonté ! »

languages.text: "Ein ... neues Schicksal?", {n}wiederholt Solomorne langsam und mit einem ungläubigen Unterton.{/n} "Selbst ein Degenerat wie Ihr sollte wissen, dass jeder Mensch von Geburt an dem Plan des Gottimperators zu dienen hat und jeder Versuch, das zu ändern, gegen Seinen Willen verstößt!"
languages.original_text: "Forge... a new destiny?" {n}Solomorne repeats slowly, with an undertone of utter disbelief at what he is hearing.{/n} "Even you, a degenerate, should know that man is bound to serve the God-Emperor's plan from birth, and that any attempt to change that is a violation of His will!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein ... neues Schicksal?", {n}wiederholt Solomorne langsam und mit einem ungläubigen Unterton.{/n} "Selbst ein Degenerat wie Ihr sollte wissen, dass jeder Mensch von Geburt an dem Plan des Gottimperators zu dienen hat und jeder Versuch, das zu ändern, gegen Seinen Willen verstößt!"
